0.8.name: wordpress/wp-advert-manager
0.8.description: Plugin, that controls your advertisement codes (such as Google Adsense, Zorka (ru), counters/ratings, etc.) in begining and ending of posts. All the information (general, changelog, installation, usage) you need about this plugin in russian can be found here: WP Advert Manager. It is the exact same readme.html is included in the zip package.
